Producer: Laura Ivey, Janet Brenner, Erik Jendresen
Production Co: BRON Studios, Pilothouse Pictures, Co-Op Entertainment, Apple Lane Productions, The Exchange, Playtone
Synopsis: During the summer of 1942, a 14-year-old (Alex Neustaedter) looks after his widowed mother (Meg Ryan) and two siblings while working as a bicycle messenger.
Title: Ithaca
